snippet: COHEN--Elias A. Ever present in our thoughts, we lovingly recall our E.A. Cohen who left us 64 years ago on July 2, 1952. The Cohen Family The Elias A. Cohen Foundation 1/3...
lead_paragraph: COHEN--Elias A. Ever present in our thoughts, we lovingly recall our E.A. Cohen who left us 64 years ago on July 2, 1952. The Cohen Family The Elias A. Cohen Foundation 1/3
